talks.title: Building Modern Web Apps with React & Next.js
talks.shortDescription: Taught 30+ students about modern React patterns and Next.js fundamentals
talks.fullDescription:
Led a comprehensive 2-hour workshop covering modern React development patterns, Next.js App Router, and best practices for building production-ready web applications.

Key topics included:
• React Hooks and state management
• Next.js 14 App Router and Server Components
• TypeScript integration and type safety
• Deployment strategies with Vercel

The workshop included hands-on coding exercises where participants built a full-stack application from scratch. Received overwhelmingly positive feedback with students successfully deploying their first Next.js applications by the end of the session.

talks.title: Introduction to Git & GitHub
talks.shortDescription: Introduced 50+ freshmen to version control and collaborative development
talks.fullDescription:
Delivered an introductory workshop on Git and GitHub for incoming CS students, covering fundamental concepts of version control and collaborative software development.

Workshop covered:
• Git basics: commits, branches, and merges
• GitHub workflow and pull requests
• Collaborative development best practices
• Resolving merge conflicts

Students completed hands-on exercises including creating their first repository, making commits, and submitting pull requests. This workshop helped establish a strong foundation for their future development projects.
